parameter.name: expirationPolicy
parameter.description: Configures the minimum amount of time that a dynamic configuration instance can remain idle before the runtime considers it eligible for expiration. This does not mean that the platform will expire the instance at the exact moment that it becomes eligible. The runtime will actually purge the instances when it sees it fit.

parameter.name: userName
parameter.description: Elasticsearch instance username. Keep this blank for anonymous user.

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: Elasticsearch instance password. Keep this blank for anonymous user.

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

operation.name: bulkOperation
operation.description: Bulk operation makes it possible to perform many index, delete and update operations in a single API call.

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: Index name on which bulk operation Performed

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Type name on which bulk operation Performed

parameter.name: jsonfile
parameter.description: Provide the JSON file path

parameter.name: jsonText
parameter.description: Provide the JSON string

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: clearScroll
operation.description: The search contexts used by the Search Scroll operation are automatically deleted when the scroll times out. Clear scroll operation release search contexts as soon as they are not necessary anymore using the Clear Scroll.

parameter.name: scrollId
parameter.description: Scroll identifier to clear scroll

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: closeIndex
operation.description: A closed index has almost no overhead. It is used to close an Index. If you want to keep your data but save resources (memory/CPU), a good alternative to deleting an index is to close them.

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: The index to close

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Time to wait for the all the nodes to acknowledge if the index is closed

parameter.name: masterNodeTimeout
parameter.description: Timeout to connect to the master node

parameter.name: indicesOpt
parameter.description: IndicesOptions controls how unavailable indices are resolved and how wildcard expressions are expanded

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: createIndex
operation.description: The createIndex Operation allows to instantiate an index.

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: The index to create

parameter.name: indexSettings
parameter.description: Settings for this index

parameter.name: indexSettingFile
parameter.description: Index Settings JSON

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: The index type to define index

parameter.name: indexMapping
parameter.description: The mapping for index type, provided as a JSON string

parameter.name: jsonInputPath
parameter.description: Path of the JSON file. The whole source including all of its sections (mappings, settings and aliases) can be provided in this json file.

parameter.name: indexAlias
parameter.description: The alias of the index

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Timeout to wait for the all the nodes to acknowledge the index creation

parameter.name: masterNodeTimeout
parameter.description: Timeout to connect to the master node

parameter.name: waitForActiveShards
parameter.description: The number of active shard copies to wait for before the create index

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: deleteDocument
operation.description: Delete Document operation allows to delete a typed JSON document from a specific index based on its id

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: Name of the index

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Type of the index

parameter.name: documentId
parameter.description: ID of the document

parameter.name: routing
parameter.description: Routing is used to determine in which shard the document will reside in

parameter.name: parent
parameter.description: Parent value of the index request

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Time to wait for primary shard to become available

parameter.name: refreshPolicy
parameter.description: Refresh policy is used to control when changes made by the requests are made visible to search. Option for refresh policy A) true : Refresh the relevant primary and replica shards (not the whole index) immediately after the operation occurs, so that the updated document appears in search results immediately. B) wait_for : Wait for the changes made by the request to be made visible by a refresh before replying. This doesnt force an immediate refresh, rather, it waits for a refresh to happen. C) false (default) : Take no refresh related actions. The changes made by this request will be made visible at some point after the request returns.

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: Version number of the indexed document

parameter.name: versionType
parameter.description: Version type: internal, external, external_gte

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.description: Set realtime flag

parameter.name: refresh

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: Version number of the indexed document

parameter.name: versionType
parameter.description: Version type: internal, external, external_gte,

parameter.name: outputMimeType

operation.name: indexDocument
operation.description: Index Document operation adds or updates a typed JSON document in a specific index, making it searchable.

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: Name of the index

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Type of the index

parameter.name: documentId
parameter.description: ID of the document

parameter.name: routing
parameter.description: Routing is used to determine in which shard the document will reside in

parameter.name: parent
parameter.description: A parent-child relationship can be established between documents in the same index by making one mapping type the parent of another

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Timeout to wait for primary shard to become available

parameter.name: refreshPolicy
parameter.description: Refresh policy is used to control when changes made by the requests are made visible to search. Option for refresh policy A) true : Refresh the relevant primary and replica shards (not the whole index) immediately after the operation occurs, so that the updated document appears in search results immediately. B) wait_for : Wait for the changes made by the request to be made visible by a refresh before replying. This doesnt force an immediate refresh, rather, it waits for a refresh to happen. C) false (default) : Take no refresh related actions. The changes made by this request will be made visible at some point after the request returns.

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: Version number of the indexed document. It will control the version of the document the operation is intended to be executed against.

parameter.name: versionType
parameter.description: Version type: internal, external, external_gte

parameter.name: operationType
parameter.description: Type of the operation. When create type is used, the index operation will fail if a document by that id already exists in the index.

parameter.name: pipeline
parameter.description: Name of the ingest pipeline to be executed before indexing the document

parameter.name: jsonInputPath
parameter.description: Provide the JSON file path

parameter.name: documentSource
parameter.description: Provide the Document source

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.name: targetValue

operation.name: updateDocument
operation.description: Update Document operation allows to update a document based on a script provided.

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: Name of the index

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Type of the index

parameter.name: documentId
parameter.description: ID of the document

parameter.name: routing
parameter.description: Routing is used to determine in which shard the document will reside in

parameter.name: parent
parameter.description: Parent value of the index request

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Time to wait for primary shard to become available

parameter.name: refreshPolicy
parameter.description: Refresh policy is used to control when changes made by the requests are made visible to search. Option for refresh policy A) true : Refresh the relevant primary and replica shards (not the whole index) immediately after the operation occurs, so that the updated document appears in search results immediately. B) wait_for : Wait for the changes made by the request to be made visible by a refresh before replying. This doesnt force an immediate refresh, rather, it waits for a refresh to happen. C) false (default) : Take no refresh related actions. The changes made by this request will be made visible at some point after the request returns.

parameter.name: retryOnConflict
parameter.description: How many times to retry the update operation if the document to update has been changed by another operation between the get and indexing phases of the update operation

parameter.name: fetchSource
parameter.description: Enable or disable source retrieval

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: Version number of the indexed document

parameter.name: detectNoop
parameter.description: Enable or disable the noop detection

parameter.name: scriptedUpsert
parameter.description: Indicate that the script must run regardless of whether the document exists or not

parameter.name: docAsUpsert
parameter.description: Indicate that the partial document must be used as the upsert document if it does not exist yet.

type.name: org.mule.extension.elastic.api.SearchRequestConfiguration
type.description:
@author Great Software Laboratory Pvt. Ltd.
Search request configuration parameters

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: Restricts the search request to an index

parameter.name: searchType
parameter.description: The type of the search operation to perform

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Limits the search request to a type

parameter.name: routing
parameter.description: Search the document using routing

parameter.name: scrollIntervalTime
parameter.description: Scroll interval time keep the search context alive(minutes). If value is non-zero, scroll search is initiated.

type.name: org.mule.extension.elastic.api.SearchSourceConfiguration
type.description:
@author Great Software Laboratory Pvt. Ltd.
Search source request configuration parameters

parameter.name: from
parameter.description: Retrieve search result from a certain offset

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: The number of search hits to return

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Time allowed to finish the search operation

parameter.name: sortOrder
parameter.description: The sort order of search result using default field (_score).

parameter.name: sortByFieldName
parameter.description: Field name to sort the search result

parameter.name: fetchSource
parameter.description: Fetch the source of the search document

parameter.name: includeFields
parameter.description: List of the field that are included into the document source

parameter.name: excludeFields
parameter.description: List of the field that are excluded from the document source

parameter.name: profile
parameter.description: Enable the profiling to the execution of search queries

parameter.name: explain
parameter.description: Explain the execution of search queries

parameter.name: terminateAfter
parameter.description: The maximum number of documents to collect for each shard

parameter.name: trackScores
parameter.description: Enable the search source tracking

parameter.name: trackTotalHits
parameter.description: Enable the total hits tracking

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: Returns a version for each search hit.

parameter.name: fieldName
parameter.description: Restrict the search request to field

parameter.name: queryString
parameter.description: Search text string

parameter.name: analyzer
parameter.description: The analyzer name used to analyze the query string

parameter.name: boost
parameter.description: Sets the boost value of the query

parameter.name: cutoffFrequency
parameter.description: Specify an absolute or relative document frequency

parameter.name: highFreqMinimumShouldMatch
parameter.description: Set minimum should match with possible value using integer and percentage.

parameter.name: highFreqOperator
parameter.description: High frequency query operator

parameter.name: lowFreqMinimumShouldMatch
parameter.description: Set minimum should match with possible value using integer and percentage. @see Minimum Should Matchedit

parameter.name: lowFreqOperator
parameter.description: Low frequency query operator

parameter.name: boost
parameter.description: Sets the boost value of the query

parameter.name: field
parameter.description: Restrict the search request to field

parameter.name: queryString
parameter.description: Search text string

parameter.name: boost
parameter.description: Sets the boost value of the query

parameter.name: analyzer
parameter.description: The analyzer name used to analyze the query string

parameter.name: maxExpansions
parameter.description: Number of suffixes the last term will be expanded

parameter.name: field
parameter.description: Restrict the search request to field

parameter.name: queryString
parameter.description: Search text string

parameter.name: boost
parameter.description: Sets the boost value of the query

parameter.name: analyzer
parameter.description: The analyzer name used to analyze the query string

parameter.name: searchString
parameter.description: Search text string

parameter.name: fuzziness
parameter.description: Enable fuzzy matching on the match query

parameter.name: fuzzyTranspositions
parameter.description: Allow the fuzzy transpositions match

parameter.name: prefixLength
parameter.description: Prefix length option on the match query

parameter.name: maxExpansions
parameter.description: Max expansion to control the fuzzy process of the query

parameter.name: operator
parameter.description: Set the match query operator

parameter.name: lenient
parameter.description: Ignore exceptions caused by data-type mismatches

parameter.name: zeroTermsQuery
parameter.description: Set the zero terms query option

parameter.name: cutoffFrequency
parameter.description: Specify an absolute or relative document frequency

parameter.name: autoGenerateSynonymsPhraseQuery
parameter.description: Enable the auto generate synonyms phrase

parameter.name: field
parameter.description: Restrict the search request to field

parameter.name: searchString
parameter.description: Search text string

parameter.name: fuzziness
parameter.description: Enable fuzzy matching on the match query

parameter.name: fuzzyTranspositions
parameter.description: Allow the fuzzy transpositions match

parameter.name: prefixLength
parameter.description: Prefix length option on the match query

parameter.name: maxExpansions
parameter.description: Max expansion to control the fuzzy process of the query

parameter.name: operator
parameter.description: Set the match query operator

parameter.name: lenient
parameter.description: Ignore exceptions caused by data-type mismatches

parameter.name: zeroTermsQuery
parameter.description: Set the zero terms query option

parameter.name: cutoffFrequency
parameter.description: Specify an absolute or relative document frequency

parameter.name: autoGenerateSynonymsPhraseQuery
parameter.description: Enable the auto generate synonyms phrase

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: Restrict the search request to list of field

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Type of the multi match query is executed internally

parameter.name: tieBreaker
parameter.description:
The tie breaker parameter used to select field in a group of field based on score
0.0 - Take the single best score out of multiple field
1.0 - Add together the scores of the multiple field
0.0 < n < 1.0 - Take the single best score plus tie_breaker multiplied by each of the scores from other matching fields.

parameter.name: minimumShouldMatch
parameter.description: Set minimum should match with possible value using integer and percentage.

type.name: org.mule.extension.elastic.internal.querytype.Query
type.description:
@author Great Software Laboratory Pvt. Ltd.
Base query class implemented by all elastic search query types

parameter.name: queryString
parameter.description: The actual query to be parsed

parameter.name: fieldAndBoost
parameter.description: List of the field name and associated field boost

parameter.name: analyzer
parameter.description: The analyzer name used to analyze the query string

parameter.name: analyzeWildcard
parameter.description: Analyze the wildcards terms from the query string

parameter.name: autoGenerateSynonymsPhraseQuery
parameter.description: Enable auto generated synonyms phrase queries

parameter.name: boost
parameter.description: Sets the boost value of the query

parameter.name: defaultOperator
parameter.description: The default operator used if no explicit query operator is specified

parameter.name: fuzzyMaxExpansions
parameter.description: Controls the number of terms fuzzy queries will expand to.

parameter.name: fuzzyPrefixLength
parameter.description: Set the prefix length for fuzzy queries

parameter.name: fuzzyTranspositions
parameter.description: Set to false to disable fuzzy transpositions

parameter.name: lenient
parameter.description: If set to true will cause format based failures (like providing text to a numeric field) to be ignored.

parameter.name: minimumShouldMatch
parameter.description: Set minimum should match with possible value using integer and percentage.

parameter.name: quoteFieldSuffix
parameter.description: A suffix to append to fields for quoted parts of the query string.

parameter.name: allowLeadingWildcard
parameter.description: Allow first wildcard (* or ?) in query string

parameter.name: defaultField
parameter.description: The default field for query terms if no prefix field is specified.

parameter.name: enablePositionIncrements
parameter.description: Set to true to enable position increments in result queries.

parameter.name: escape
parameter.description: Allow escape in query string

parameter.name: phraseSlop
parameter.description: Sets the default slop for phrases. If zero, then exact phrase matches are required.

parameter.name: tieBreaker
parameter.description: The disjunction max tie breaker for multi fields

parameter.name: queryString
parameter.description: The actual query to be parsed

parameter.name: fieldAndBoost
parameter.description: List of the field name and associated field boost

parameter.name: analyzer
parameter.description: The analyzer name used to analyze the query string

parameter.name: analyzeWildcard
parameter.description: Analyze the wildcards terms from the query string

parameter.name: autoGenerateSynonymsPhraseQuery
parameter.description: Enable auto generated synonyms phrase queries

parameter.name: boost
parameter.description: Sets the boost value of the query

parameter.name: defaultOperator
parameter.description: The default operator used if no explicit query operator is specified

parameter.name: fuzzyMaxExpansions
parameter.description: Controls the number of terms fuzzy queries will expand to.

parameter.name: fuzzyPrefixLength
parameter.description: Set the prefix length for fuzzy queries

parameter.name: fuzzyTranspositions
parameter.description: Set to false to disable fuzzy transpositions

parameter.name: lenient
parameter.description: If set to true will cause format based failures (like providing text to a numeric field) to be ignored.

parameter.name: minimumShouldMatch
parameter.description: Set minimum should match with possible value using integer and percentage.

parameter.name: quoteFieldSuffix
parameter.description: A suffix to append to fields for quoted parts of the query string.

parameter.name: simpleQueryStringFlag
parameter.description: Specify which parsing flag should be enabled
